content.value: There are four main components to planning the projects architecture:
content.resolvedHtml:
There are four main components to planning the projects architecture:

Mapping Requirements

Take business requirements and identify the suitable Kentico features and functionalities.

Picking a project type and development model

Choose the appropriate development model.

Planning content management

Create a strategy for the initial and ongoing content and asset production, organization, etc.

Identifying data structures

Build an information architecture to act as a foundation for development.

overview.value: Prepare by mapping requirements, picking a development model, planning content management, and identifying data structures.

teaser.value: With the knowledge you gathered in the first phase you are ready to start turning that into an actionable plan. We wrote this section to guide you through the process of making that plan. A solid architecture prepares you for success in development and beyond.
